reviews.review_msg: This class seemed easy and fun at first! but when it came to the times that we had to do the assigmnets, there was not a clear rubric in place because she says "I don't want to out you guys in the box, and you guys have to be creative", but the comment she provides is generic and not helpful and she gives the low grades back a month later

Has cancelled more lectures than taught, given us ridiculous "assignments" in lieu: Watch an Amy Schumer movie. Post 250 words about Valentine's Day. Create a playlist. Hasn't marked the one assignment she has given us, and it was due a month and a half ago. Rude and demeaning. I don't know why she's teaching, she clearly has no interest in it.
Unclear in what she expected for assignments-- and information she gave was occasionally outdated. Marking was tough and vague feedback.
